subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] long message from EVP maker allaphone session I need opinions
author: Ron Lederer
full_text:
--0-734487849-1207749213=:68794
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Bruce   I am hearing most as you do.  The first word MY is not coming to me clear enough without moving to another program to check out. If it is in fact MY then it would make sense that AIR PEOPLE is someone other than MY people.  Without MY it could still make sense that AIR PEOPLE is referring to us.  I like that...AIR PEOPLE.  Ron L....your fellow air person.  

bhali333 <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:          
Hi guy's,

I got this message from a session with the new EVPM file yesterday.
It's a pretty long message and in it I believe they are asking for us 
to answer questions for them and not only ask questions.

Listening to this message and others I have received over the past 
week and a half, has leading me to believe that the reference to air 
people means US! It stands to reason (we are the air breathing people)
they are in spirit and we refer to them as such. So I am beginning to 
think their reference to us is air people. 

Where the speculation earlier in the experiments was that the mention 
of air people meant themselves because they where not solid physical 
bodies. but made of spirit.

Just something to chew on, and give us a research related topic to 
discuss.

When you listen to the file especially for you new people please read 
the description as the message is rather long and may be hard for new 
people that are not accustomed to listening to this type of file may 
have trouble keeping up.

let me know your take on what the reference to air people is in this 
message. and then I will post my interpretation.

Bruce



                           

 __________________________________________________
